name: The Legacy: Forgotten Gates
description: "The Legacy: Forgotten Gates" is a hidden-object adventure game packed with mini-games and puzzles, telling a story of a journey to another world, where danger and unexpected turns of events await around every corner!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1300 MB available space
